channel.title: Massacred World - Bringing back Lumby PVP
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/20ppvrn.png[/img]
[img]http://img.informer.com/icons/png/48/3665/3665440.png[/img][b][size=1.35em][font=trebuchet ms]About MW[/font][/size][/b][font=palatino linotype][font=trebuchet ms] [img]http://www.public.iastate.edu/~gbetcher/images/purpbut.gif[/img] Welcome to [b]Massacred World[/b]! I want to share my new project which is a different type of PK server that doesn't look like most server nowadays. My plans are to make this based mainly on pking or PvP (everywhere) type while there are "secret" places around the world that can make you a better player and these places will only be known for those who finds it. This also have skilling and bossing ofcourse to get better items for those who like to. New plans are to make it more unique and take it to the next level by implementing custom features which will be nice and new.[/font][/font]
[img]http://www.dragonlordsnet.com/bk92.gif[/img] [font=trebuchet ms][size=1.35em][b]Game Screenshots[/b][/size][/font] [SPOILER= Open] [font=trebuchet ms][b]Fight cave waves, get your fire cape[/b][/font][img]https://i.gyazo.com/3463d2b083480ef8ee90db2d1b5c8041.png[/img] [b][font=trebuchet ms]Multi pvp zone [/font][/b][img]https://i.gyazo.com/4405a884d59734e4634e0f08f716afa0.png[/img] [b][font=trebuchet ms]When you get rekt [/font][/b][img]https://i.gyazo.com/0899b23c6529960fd307a4c6fc63ddd2.png[/img] [b][font=trebuchet ms] New tasks tab [/font][/b][img]https://i.gyazo.com/ee71ddca61242ad2ec0b2d253337c382.png[/img][b][font=trebuchet ms] Spooky house![/font][/b][img]https://i.gyazo.com/9b161c95c47b8e00c13f4e2233f74b73.png[/img][b][font=trebuchet ms] New secret land[/font][/b][img]https://i.gyazo.com/5e12bbafaf83a447b62269a7769d4247.png[/img][b][font=trebuchet ms] Task (quests) started[/font][/b][img]https://i.gyazo.com/9ceb6d94e336d1f1d28f361545b72efd.png[/img] [b][font=trebuchet ms]Current Smart Client[/font][/b] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/ea748d2fa6e3d0f467f3313bf28aab06.png[/img] [b][font=trebuchet ms]Jail of Massacred World[/font][/b][img]https://i.gyazo.com/fb2324b76bb6983fcfbaf0ef105fec32.png[/img][img]https://i.gyazo.com/d6876e86190cd8b713ff25498abff135.png[/img][img]https://i.gyazo.com/9a9223c2f349f2d34c38c1354431e07c.png[/img][img]https://i.gyazo.com/1683015b65335523a4d4a0b836908b1c.png[/img][img]https://i.gyazo.com/ac6d76cd078ed4abff6c6fc318eca25e.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[img]http://www.tip.it/runescape/images/items/6967.gif[/img] [font=trebuchet ms][size=1.35em][b]Miscellaneous Screenshots [/b][/size][/font][SPOILER=Open] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/4fbf866c032a7ec3259289f0e233af83.png[/img] [font=trebuchet ms]Mining with perk [/font][img]https://i.gyazo.com/f07e9f62471724e424f2777770f14654.png[/img] [font=trebuchet ms]Clue scrolls easy, medium & hard! [/font][img]https://i.gyazo.com/97518400e97dc22e3b3bc047535814c4.png[/img] [font=trebuchet ms]Woodcutting perk token that gives bonus [/font][img]https://i.gyazo.com/6a5d2b1fd9676992d32d90fdb1b44091.png[/img] [b][font=trebuchet ms]Woodcutting [/font][/b][img]https://i.gyazo.com/05b12e778913131b5c77344086b3cdbd.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[img]https://www.nutritioncare.org/pages/images/people-icon.png[/img] [font=trebuchet ms][size=1.35em][b]Join us![/b][/size][/font] [img]http://www.public.iastate.edu/~gbetcher/images/purpbut.gif[/img][font=trebuchet ms]Are you interested in joining the team as a developer? If so then do hit me a PM here and let me know why I should choose you as a web/content/client developer.[/font]
[img]http://orig08.deviantart.net/fa9c/f/2015/066/e/5/purple_guy_icon_by_thesonofjudas-d8kuxk5.gif[/img] [font=book antiqua][b][size=1.35em][font=trebuchet ms]Credits:[/font][/size][/b][/font] [img]http://www.public.iastate.edu/~gbetcher/images/purpbut.gif[/img][font=trebuchet ms]Sanity [/font][img]http://www.public.iastate.edu/~gbetcher/images/purpbut.gif[/img][font=trebuchet ms]Ardi [/font][img]http://www.public.iastate.edu/~gbetcher/images/purpbut.gif[/img][font=trebuchet ms]Hofmann [/font][img]http://www.public.iastate.edu/~gbetcher/images/purpbut.gif[/img][font=trebuchet ms]Runescape[/font][/center]

item.title: Massacred World - Bringing back Lumby PVP
item.dc:creator: @WarTusk-RSPS WarTusk-RSPS
item.description:
@WarTusk-RSPS wrote:

I am currently on my mobile so I am not sure if this is an issue for everyone or not. But the color for all of your words is a very clear grey and is hard to read. I would suggest changing the color or increase the font. Other then that I’m excited to see what type of updates you push out. Good luck with the project!

Read full topic
item.source: Massacred World - Bringing back Lumby PVP

item.title: Massacred World - Bringing back Lumby PVP
item.dc:creator: @Onur-163 Onur-163
item.description:
@Onur-163 wrote:

[center]

20ppvrn.png700×160

[size=1.35em][font=trebuchet ms]About MW[/font][/size][font=palatino linotype][font=trebuchet ms]
Welcome to Massacred World! I want to share my new project which is a different type of PK server that doesn’t look like most server nowadays.
My plans are to make this based mainly on pking or PvP (everywhere) type while there are “secret” places around the world
that can make you a better player and these places will only be known for those who finds it. This also have skilling and bossing ofcourse
to get better items for those who like to. New plans are to make it more unique and take it to the next level by implementing custom features which will be nice and new.[/font][/font]

choose you as a web/content/client developer.[/font]
